sense.gloss: lording it over others, throwing one's weight around, acting as if one owns the place
careless, thoughtless, stupid, heedless, unobservant, inadvertent, incautious
to apologize for a long neglect of friends (apologise)
the open sky and the serene sea, as open as the sky and serene as the sea, magnanimous
not having met or contacted someone for a long time, neglect of friends
free and easy, open and natural, not fastidious
magnanimous in one's attitude of mind, grand in one's idea or mind-set

sdata.j: かげでは、↑二↑↓に↓↑人↑↓にん↓して↑僕↑↓ぼく↓のことを↑迂↑↓まが↓濶な↑奴↑↓やつ↓、↑頓↑↓ひたぶる↓↑馬↑↓ば↓な↑奴↑↓やつ↓、↑助平↑↓すけべい↓な↑奴↑↓やつ↓などあざ↑笑↑↓わら↓っているのかも↑知↑↓し↓れないと、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に↑不愉快↑↓ふゆかい↓を↑感↑↓かん↓じた。
sdata.e: I sensed with discomfort that the two of them might ridicule me behind my back as a thoughtless, simple-minded satyr.
